landing_seo_title: Stocknear — Institutional-Grade Stock Data for Everyone
landing_seo_description: AI-powered stock analysis, real-time options flow, smart money tracking, and 50+ screener filters. Join 10,000+ investors using institutional-grade data. Free to start.
landing_hero_subtitle: AI-powered analysis, real-time options flow, smart money tracking, and 50+ screener filters — all the tools Wall Street uses, now available to you.
landing_review_1_text: The options flow data is incredibly fast. I can see institutional trades as they happen and position myself before the market moves. Saved me thousands in my first month.
landing_review_2_text: The AI agent is like having a personal analyst. I ask it to analyze any stock and get a complete breakdown in seconds. The congress trading tracker is a game changer too.
landing_review_3_text: I switched from Yahoo Finance and never looked back. The stock screener, portfolio tracking, and analyst data are all in one place. Plus the educational articles helped me understand options.
landing_review_4_text: Dark pool and unusual order flow data used to cost me $200/month on another platform. Stocknear gives me the same quality data at a fraction of the price. The pre-built filters save me hours.
landing_review_5_text: Started as a complete beginner and the learning center articles taught me everything. Now I use the screener and AI agent daily. Best investment platform for anyone starting out.
landing_review_6_text: The hedge fund tracking and 13F filings analysis is spot on. I can see what Buffett and Ackman are buying before most retail traders even know about it. Incredible value for the price.

landing_features_subtitle: From AI research to real-time institutional flow data — tools that used to cost thousands, now free to start.

landing_feature_analyst_bullet_1: Analyst accuracy rankings and win rates
landing_feature_analyst_bullet_3: Consensus price targets with upside potential
landing_how_step1_description: Sign up in 30 seconds with your email or Google account. No credit card required.
landing_how_step2_description: AI agent, screeners, options flow, smart money tracking, and 10,000+ stocks — all at your fingertips.
landing_how_step3_description: Start free with 10 AI credits. Unlock more with Plus ($10/mo) or Pro ($25/mo) when you need it.
landing_faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know about getting started.
landing_faq_q1_answer: Yes. The free plan gives you 10 AI credits per month, 1 watchlist, 1 portfolio, 3 price alerts, and access to the stock screener. No credit card required to sign up.
landing_faq_q2_title: What data sources does Stocknear use?
landing_faq_q2_answer: We partner with the same institutional-grade data vendors that serve hedge funds and investment banks. Our data covers real-time quotes, financial statements, options chains, insider trades, congress filings, analyst ratings, and more.
landing_faq_q3_title: How is this different from Yahoo Finance?
landing_faq_q3_answer: Stocknear offers tools Yahoo Finance doesn't: real-time options flow, AI-powered stock analysis, dark pool tracking, congress trading data, hedge fund 13F filings, and 50+ screener filters. All in one platform.
landing_faq_q4_answer: Absolutely. There are no contracts or hidden fees. You can cancel your Plus or Pro subscription with one click, and you'll keep access until the end of your billing period.
landing_faq_q5_answer: Not at all. Our AI agent explains everything in plain English, and we have 205+ educational articles covering every concept from basics to advanced strategies. The platform is built for beginners and professionals alike.
landing_cta_title: Ready to Make Smarter Investment Decisions?
landing_cta_description: Join 10,000+ investors who trade with institutional-grade data instead of guesswork.
